/usr/bin/c++ -Wall -O2 -pthread CMakeFiles/alarm_system.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/alarm_system.dir/gpio/gpio.cpp.o CMakeFiles/alarm_system.dir/dht/dht.cpp.o CMakeFiles/alarm_system.dir/pir/pir.cpp.o CMakeFiles/alarm_system.dir/display/i2c_display.cpp.o CMakeFiles/alarm_system.dir/display/i2c_handle.cpp.o CMakeFiles/alarm_system.dir/buzzer/buzzer.cpp.o -o alarm_system  -lgpiod /usr/lib/aarch64-linux-gnu/libi2c.so
